articles.description: We set the scene for the knockout stage of Euro 2024 by picking out some of the themes to look out for.
articles.title: Euro 2024: What to look out for in knockout stage

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he is "pain free" after coming through an exhibition against Daniil Medvedev prior to the start of Wimbledon next week.
articles.title: Wimbledon: Novak Djokovic 'pain free' after knee operation

articles.description: A thrilling battle for yellow will not take the shine off Mark Cavendish's attempt to break the Tour de France stage win record.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024: Mark Cavendish & Tadej Pogacar among star attractions

articles.description: Aston Villa complete the signing of Chelsea defender Ian Maatsen for £35m.
articles.title: Ian Maatsen: Aston Villa sign defender from Chelsea

articles.description: Max Verstappen edges out Lando Norris by just 0.093 seconds to take pole position for the sprint race at the Austrian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Austrian GP: Max Verstappen on sprint pole

articles.description: We have read, watched and listened to what English pundits and media think of the Three Lions at Euro 2024, but how does the rest of Europe view them?
articles.title: Kane in crisis, toxic pressure - what Europe thinks of England at Euro 2024

articles.description: World number one Nelly Korda pulls out of the Aramco Team Series event in Hemel Hempstead after being bitten by a dog.
articles.title: Nelly Korda: World number one withdraws from Aramco Team Series after dog bite

articles.description: Paris 2024 president Tony Estanguet is "confident" the River Seine will be used at the Olympics, despite failing water quality tests.
articles.title: Paris 2024 president 'confident' River Seine will be used despite pollution concerns

articles.description: Ben Stokes backs Jos Buttler to remain as England white-ball captain, despite the heavy defeat by India in the T20 World Cup semi-final.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Ben Stokes backs Jos Buttler to remain England white-ball captain

articles.description: Charley Hull and Georgia Hall are selected to represent Great Britain in the women's golf competition at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Charley Hull and Georgia Hall selected by Team GB in golf
